text: Aur uss waqiye ka bhi zikar kijiye! Jabkay kafir log aap ki nisbat tadbeer soch rahey thay kay aap ko qaid ker len yaa aap ko qatal ker dalen yaa aap ko kharij-e-watan ker den aur woh to apni tadbeeren ker rahey thay aur Allah apni tadbeer ker raha tha aur sab say ziyada mustehkum tadbeer wala Allah hai
